issues.description: Hero CTA may not be visible above fold on mobile with 2-column restructure
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop grid + single stack mobile could push CTA below 568px viewport, killing conversions

issues.description: Sticky CTA activates at 40% scroll but hero CTA may already be invisible
issues.rationale: Gap between hero CTA disappearing and sticky appearing creates conversion dead zone

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks specific placement - could interrupt conversion flow
issues.rationale: 6-8 rows of audit data without defined section placement risks breaking scan-to-action flow

issues.description: Proof bar 24-32px gap insufficient for mobile thumb navigation
issues.rationale: Tight spacing between hero and proof creates cramped mobile experience, hurts scannability

issues.description: Problem/Solution merge may obscure value prop clarity in 8-second test
issues.rationale: Before/after layout could confuse first-time visitors about what LaunchBase actually does

issues.description: Pricing cards equal height constraint may truncate critical pricing details
issues.rationale: Equal height forces content compression, potentially hiding features that drive upgrade decisions

issues.description: 80px section spacing too generous on mobile, increases scroll fatigue
issues.rationale: Large gaps force more scrolling to reach pricing/CTA, especially problematic for 48hr urgency message

issues.description: H1 48px may be too large for mobile single-column hero stack
issues.rationale: Large typography in constrained mobile hero could dominate screen, reducing CTA visibility

issues.description: Proof chips 24px margin creates inconsistent spacing rhythm with section gaps
issues.rationale: 24px margin conflicts with 80px section rhythm, breaks visual flow between hero and next section

issues.description: Button hierarchy 56px primary height may conflict with sticky CTA 56px specification
issues.rationale: Identical heights between hero CTA and sticky CTA reduces sticky prominence and recognition

suggestedFixes.fix: Ensure mobile hero stack keeps CTA above 480px fold with max 320px content height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Guarantees hero CTA visibility on standard mobile viewports before sticky activation

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA at 20% scroll or when hero CTA exits viewport, whichever comes first
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates conversion dead zone by maintaining continuous CTA availability

suggestedFixes.fix: Place audit log after How It Works section, limit to 4 rows max, 240px height cap
suggestedFixes.rationale: Positions trust proof after value explanation, prevents overwhelming early conversion flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Increase proof bar margin to 48px on mobile, 32px desktop for better thumb clearance
suggestedFixes.rationale: Improves mobile touch navigation and creates breathing room between hero and social proof

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 3-column layout: Problem | Solution | Outcome, with clear section headers
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains merge efficiency while preserving clarity about what LaunchBase solves and delivers

suggestedFixes.fix: Use flexible height cards with 280px minimum, expandable details in accordions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Balances visual consistency with complete feature disclosure for informed purchase decisions

suggestedFixes.fix: Reduce mobile section gaps to 48px to maintain urgency while preserving hierarchy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Faster scroll to pricing supports 48hr launch timeline while maintaining visual structure

suggestedFixes.fix: Scale H1 to 36px on mobile breakpoints under 480px width
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains headline impact while preserving screen real estate for CTA visibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Align proof chips margin with section rhythm: 16px from hero, 32px to next section
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates consistent spacing flow that guides eye naturally from hero to proof to next section

suggestedFixes.fix: Make sticky CTA 64px height with stronger shadow to differentiate from hero 56px CTA
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual distinction helps users recognize sticky as persistent action, improving conversion recognition
